thread.section_title: American Freight Furniture & Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Freight Furniture & Mattress | americanfreight.us
thread.title: Judith Setticerze
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Judith Setticerze

author: Judith Setticerze
title: Judith Setticerze
text: Every delivery had damaged furniture and it took multiple deliveries to get it right. Very difficult to get it corrected- they won't take the furniture back until you take pictures of the damage and they get an ok from the company. Not worth the frustration regardless of the price. Will never order from them again and would NEVER recommend them.
